long_desc.thetext:
We have just recently updated project to version 2.1 from 2.0. So far was everything ok and running pretty-print was without issues. Suddenly i updated from our Git repository and running pretty-print again gives following output:
>>> Pretty-printing code... - Pretty-printing files: 60%<type 'exceptions.IOError'> :Traceback (most recent call last): File "C:\@workspace\NEN\qooxdoo\tool\bin\generator.py", line 266, in <module> print >> sys.stderr, el[:300] TypeError: 'int' object is not subscriptable
Really hard to say from this error what is happening and what file caused it. So I went into generator.py and modified that a bit to throw whole exception. Than run the job again:
>>> Pretty-printing code... - Pretty-printing files: 60%Traceback (most recent call last): File "C:\@workspace\NEN\qooxdoo\tool\bin\generator.py", line 243, in <module> main() File "C:\@workspace\NEN\qooxdoo\tool\bin\generator.py", line 226, in main generatorObj.run() File "C:\@workspace\NEN\qooxdoo\tool\pylib\generator\Generator.py", line 500,in run self._codeGenerator.runPrettyPrinting(self._classesObj) File "C:\@workspace\NEN\qooxdoo\tool\pylib\generator\code\CodeGenerator.py", line 1054, in runPrettyPrinting filetool.save(self._classes[classId].path, compiled) File "C:\@workspace\NEN\qooxdoo\tool\pylib\misc\filetool.py", line 85, in save
outputFile = codecs.open(filePath, encoding=encoding, mode="w", errors="replace") File "C:\Python27\lib\codecs.py", line 881, in open file = __builtin__.open(filename, mode, buffering) IOError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: u'C:\\@workspace\\NEN\\app\\source\\class \\nen\\widget\\tooltiptable\\rowrenderer\\RoleRenderer.js'
Not sure what caused the issue with permission. I had removed file and made checkout on that and than it worked again.
Reason for this bug report is mostly about making that error tell me more. This way it hides important information. I don't know Python, so hard to tell, what's going on there.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
